text: M.K.M. Abdul Salam (born 1921) was an Indian politician of the Indian National Congress who served as a member of the Lok Sabha from Tiruchirappalli in 1957. ==Education== Salam studied at St. Joseph's College, Tiruchirappalli. ==Memberships== * Vice-President, Tiruchy Municipal Council * Member, Tiruchy Library Committee * Vice-President, District Congress Committee * Ex-Member, Executive Committee, Madras Flying Club == References == Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Tamil Nadu Category:1921 births Category:2nd Lok Sabha members Category:Lok Sabha members from Tamil Nadu Category:People from Tiruchirappalli district Category:Possibly living people Category:St Joseph's College, Tiruchirappalli alumni
title: M.K.M. Abdul Salam
